TopicTitle: F-16 Inspired Figher / Interceptor! The K-16 Mk 02!

Articles.Content:
[http://www.megafileupload.com/19cz/K-16_Mk_02.craft](http://www.megafileupload.com/19cz/K-16_Mk_02.craft) (I can't spell "Fighter" ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ) 

Hi everyone! I've browsed this section of the forums for a long time and have been constantly amazed at everything you all produce and share. If possible, I'd like to contribute and share a fighter / interceptor I've been working on for a little while. I'm not too sure how people like clipped parts but I really really like this plane. It's handles well and has a tendency to nose up during flight. It'll take off around 150 m/s and can cruise at 3.0 - 4.0 mach pretty easily at higher altitudes, and has a pretty long range. Be careful, however, because at extremely high-g maneuvers it will break up. Under normal circumstances, it's pretty durable and you have to really try to break the plane apart.

I hope everyone enjoys this plane! Critiques and opinions are always welcome! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Happy flying! 

![2jatLad.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2jatLad.jpg)

![fieBpi7.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fieBpi7.jpg)
